br.com.caelum.vraptor.vraptor2
Class VRaptor2Config

java.lang.Object
  br.com.caelum.vraptor.vraptor2.VRaptor2Config
All Implemented Interfaces:
Config
@ApplicationScoped
public class VRaptor2Config
extends java.lang.Object
implements Config

Loads some basic config from vraptor.xml.
Only this basic configuration is automatically supported. This way we can support vraptor2 most important features. We do not really parse the xml file as it would be a little bit too much for the information that we require.

Author:
Guilherme Silveira
